short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple way to learn the names of members in your ward.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Activate this extension on the "Ward Directory and Map" page of your online Member Tools (https://directory.churchofjesuschrist.org/) to look at a picture of each household with the names hidden. Quiz yourself and reveal the names, if necessary.

To use this extension:
1. Navigate to https://www.churchofjesuschrist.org/
2. Log in to your member account
3. From the "Tools" menu choose "Ward Directory and Map"
4. Activate this LDS Directory Flashcards extension from your browser menu bar
5. Wait for the new popup to load all the household photos
6. Quiz yourself as you navigate between the photos!
